name: Meme Lordz
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Meme Lordz is an upcoming blockchain game powered by the BSC network. A top-down RPG utilising blockchain technology to immortalise each Meme Lord as a Non-Fungible-Token. Battle, bind and collect as you journey through a mysterious land powered by the collective thought-forms of humanity.
